item.title: 加密货币交易所交易量七个月来首次下降
item.description: 4 月份，主要加密货币交易所的交易量出现了 7 个月以来的首次下降，而市场风向标比特币则从历史最高点回落。【原文：Trading volume on major crypto exchanges fell in April for the time in seven months while market bellwether Bitcoin retreated from a record high.】

item.title: 欧洲央行部分官员认为 4 月已满足降息条件
item.description: 欧洲央行货币政策会议记录显示，一些欧洲央行官员认为上月召开的会议适宜降息。【原文：Some European Central Bank officials deemed it appropriate to cut interest rates when they convened last month, an account of their monetary-policy meeting showed.】

item.title: 铜价价差拉开，铜价多头如鲠在喉
item.description:
虽然投资者预计矿山供应的大幅紧缩将迫使冶炼厂削减产量，但巨大的供需缺口提醒我们，目前买家的供应非常充足。【原文：

While investors expect a major mine-supply squeeze will force smelters to cut output, a huge contango is a reminder that buyers are very well supplied for now.

】

item.title: 荷兰合作银行称可可历史性涨势可能已达顶峰，可可价格有所回落
item.description: 可可在纽约下跌，因为预测西非作物将迎来有利降雨，荷兰合作银行称今年的历史性涨势可能已经见顶。【原文：Cocoa fell in New York, as favorable rains were forecast for West African crops and Rabobank said this year’s historic rally has probably peaked.】

item.title: 埃尔德森称，若前景不变，欧洲央行 "最有可能 "于 6 月降息
item.description: 2023年12月19日星期二，欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员弗兰克-埃尔德森在德国法兰克福举行的新闻发布会上。欧洲央行表示，明年该地区贷款机构的资本要求将从10.7%上升至11.1%，这反映了宏观审慎政策的影响。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Frank Elderson, executive board member of the European Central Bank, during a news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, on Tuesday, Dec. 19, 2023. The European Central Bank said capital requirements for the region’s lenders will rise to 11.1% next year from 10.7%, reflecting the impact of macroprudential policies. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 埃尔多安的公共开支热潮将因抗击通胀而暂停
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）赖以建立其政治生涯的公共开支狂潮即将降温，因为政府准备冻结新项目，以集中精力应对通货膨胀。【原文：The public spending frenzy that Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan built his political career on is set to cool as the government prepares to freeze new projects in order to focus on fighting inflation.】

item.title: 第一季度外商对华投资下滑 56
item.description: 上一季度，外国企业对中国的直接投资再次下滑，这凸显了中国政府在寻求更多海外资金来帮助其经济发展时所面临的挑战。【原文：Foreign businesses’ direct investment into China last quarter slumped again, underscoring challenges for the nation as Beijing seeks more overseas funds to help its economy.】

item.title: 投票反对首席执行官后，中国平安出售 5000 万美元汇丰股票
item.description: 平安保险集团股份有限公司（Ping An Insurance Group Co.【原文：Ping An Insurance Group Co. sold about 0.4% of the shares it holds in HSBC Holdings Plc days after it voted against the reappointment of departing Chief Executive Officer Noel Quinn as a director.】

item.title: 地区银行在这个鲜有人问津的市场获得华尔街利率
item.description: 一家在高风险商业房地产领域拥有 250 亿美元风险敞口的美国地区性贷款机构，通过开发一个鲜有人问津的银行资本市场，实现了与高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A regional US lender with $25 billion exposure to the risky commercial real estate sector has pulled off the same financing cost as Goldman Sachs Group Inc. by tapping a little-used market for bank capital.】

item.title: 当红影星将在印度阿桑索尔与莫迪的印度人民党一较高下
item.description: 每天，彭博社记者都会带您走过精选的城镇和城市，为大选投票做准备。【原文：Each day, Bloomberg journalists take you across a selection of towns and cities as they gear up for the big vote.】

item.title: 由于销售强劲和税收收益，JLR 所有者塔塔汽车公司业绩超出预期
item.description: 塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd. ）第四季度利润超出预期，主要得益于其国内市场运动型多用途车销量的增长以及其英国分公司生产的豪华车。【原文：Tata Motors Ltd.’s fourth-quarter profit beat expectations, driven by rising sales of sport utility vehicles in its home market and luxury cars made by its British unit.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市的反弹获得了新的动力，市场正在等待美联储的一系列讲话，大宗商品也迎来了重要的一天。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The US stock rally gets fresh impetus, markets wait for a raft of Fed speakers and commodities have a big day. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 鹿鸣公园押注房地产，预计美联储将在 24 年降息
item.description: 对冲基金公司鹿园路管理公司（Deer Park Road Management Co.【原文：Hedge fund firm Deer Park Road Management Co. is set to pounce on beaten-down prices in the residential mortgage market on expectations that the US Federal Reserve will start lowering rates later this year.】

item.title: 津巴布韦大肆宣传黄金支持的新货币以寻求投资
item.description: 津巴布韦正在大力吸引外国资本，并利用其新的黄金支持货币来说服投资者，津巴布韦不会重蹈覆辙，因为过去的恶性通货膨胀和经济困境都是由黄金造成的。【原文：Zimbabwe is making a fresh push to lure foreign capital and is using its new gold-backed currency to persuade investors it won’t repeat mistakes that led to hyperinflation and economic woes in the past.】

item.title: KKR 一周内达成四项交易，提升美安盛在亚洲的地位
item.description: 如今，如何完成交易是一项挑战，估值差距、市场波动、利率、融资和地缘政治等障碍都可能导致收购失败。【原文：Getting deals across the finish line is a challenge these days, with hurdles such as valuation gaps, market volatility, interest rates, financing and geopolitics all capable of scuppering a takeover.】

item.title: 瑞典央行降息为瑞典住宅建筑商带来光明前景
item.description: 受瑞典央行决定先于欧元区和美国央行降息的影响，瑞典住宅建筑商今年晚些时候将开始复苏。【原文：Swedish homebuilders should start to recover later this year, boosted by the central bank’s decision to cut interest rates before its Eurozone and US peers.】

item.title: 对冲基金将养老金引向 13 万亿美元信贷市场中风险最大的一角
item.description: 在 1.3 万亿美元信贷市场中风险最高的一角进行的高风险交易正吸引着世界上一些最保守的投资者，但也引发了人们的担忧，即在积极寻求更高收益的同时，他们可能会忽略一些陷阱。【原文：A high-stakes trade in the riskiest corner of a $1.3 trillion credit market is enticing some of the world’s most conservative investors, raising concerns that in their aggressive hunt for higher yields they may be discounting some pitfalls.】

item.title: 布斯特能源公司的数百万美元赔付计划获英国法院批准
item.description: 在伦敦一名法官批准了一项重组计划后，一家倒闭的能源零售商的债权人和所有者将获得价值数千万英镑的赔付。【原文：Creditors and owners of a collapsed energy retailer are set to receive payouts worth tens of millions of pounds after a London judge approved a restructuring plan.】

item.title: 吉利旗下电动汽车制造商 Zeekr 在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中以 4.41 亿美元超额完成目标
item.description: 浙江吉利控股集团有限公司旗下的高端电动汽车品牌 Zeekr 智能科技控股有限公司扩大了首次公开募股的规模，募集资金达 4.41 亿美元，这是中国企业自 2021 年以来在美国上市募集的最大一笔资金。【原文：Zeekr Intelligent Technology Holding Ltd., the high-end electric car brand under Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., expanded its initial public offering to raise $441 million in the biggest US listing by a China-based company since 2021.】

item.title: 新加坡石油老将 OK Lim 被判定犯有刑事罪
item.description: 据《商业时报》报道，倒闭的石油公司兴隆贸易私人有限公司（Hin Leong Trading Pte.【原文：Lim Oon Kuin, founder of collapsed oil firm Hin Leong Trading Pte., has been convicted of three criminal charges after a lengthy trial in Singapore, the Business Times reported.】

item.title: 俄罗斯农作物从高温转为霜冻，田地进一步受损
item.description: 在早春异常温暖之后，本月一场反常的零度以下暴风雪袭击了俄罗斯小麦和油菜籽的主要种植区，俄罗斯正在评估作物损失情况。【原文：Russia is assessing the crop damage after an unseasonal sub-zero snap hit key wheat and oilseeds growing parts of the country this month after an early and unusually warm spring.】

item.title: 现在从固定收益中获利的不同方法
item.description: 欢迎收看每分钟赚取 200 万美元的《每周固定》。我是跨资产记者凯蒂-格雷菲尔德。【原文：Welcome to the Weekly Fix, the newsletter that mints $2 million a minute. I’m cross-asset reporter Katie Greifeld.】

item.title: 据说CVC将为日本FineToday寻求30亿美元的估值
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，CVC Capital Partners Plc 正在为个人护理用品公司 FineToday Holdings Co.【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc is seeking a valuation of $2 billion to $3 billion in an initial public offering of personal-care business FineToday Holdings Co., people familiar with the matter said, as the private equity firm looks to capitalize on the strong performance of Japan’s stock market.】

item.title: 无人机袭击莫斯科附近小型独立炼油厂引发火灾
item.description: 无人机袭击了距离莫斯科约 100 英里（161 公里）的一个小型炼油厂，这是两天内乌克兰对俄罗斯原油加工设施的第二次明显袭击。【原文：Drones attacked a small oil refinery about 100 miles (161 kilometers) from Moscow, in the second apparent Ukrainian strike on Russian crude-processing facilities in two days.】

item.title: 印度外汇储备本月首次增长
item.description: 印度的外汇储备四周来首次出现增长，原因是货币当局可能购买了美元。【原文：India’s foreign exchange reserves rose for the first time in four weeks, as monetary authority likely bought dollars.】

item.title: 腾讯支持的初创公司在进军海湾地区之前寻求中东基金的支持
item.description: Airwallex 已与几家中东主权财富基金进行了融资谈判，这家支付平台初创公司正准备加入全球同行的行列，向该地区扩张。【原文：Airwallex has held talks with several Middle Eastern sovereign wealth funds to raise capital as the payment platform startup prepares to join global peers in expanding into the region.】

item.title: Brad Setser 将为您带来更多关于日元、中国新一轮震荡和挖掘机的内容
item.description:
世界上正在发生大事。【原文：

Big things are going on in the world.

】

item.title: 意大利银行被调查，BFF 银行股价暴跌 32
item.description: 意大利银行周四下令暂时停止利润分配和海外扩张，以调查这家意大利专业金融公司，此后，BFF Bank SpA 的暴跌幅度创下历史之最。【原文：BFF Bank SpA plunged the most on record after the Bank of Italy ordered a temporary halt on profit distribution and expansion abroad as a result of a probe into the Italian specialty finance company on Thursday.】

item.title: 赛诺菲与诺瓦维克斯签署价值 12 亿美元的疫苗许可协议
item.description: 赛诺菲和诺瓦维克斯公司签署了一项许可协议，其中包括将Covid-19和流感疫苗组合进行商业化。【原文：Sanofi and Novavax Inc. signed a licensing agreement that includes commercializing a combined Covid-19 and flu shot.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行聘请前巴克莱银行员工迪蒙塔担任金融机构主管
item.description: 据知情人士透露，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）聘请前巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）投资银行家雷纳托-迪蒙塔（Renato Di Monta）领导其金融机构集团。【原文：UniCredit SpA hired former Barclays Plc investment banker Renato Di Monta to lead its financial institutions group, people with knowledge of the matter said.】
